markdownRemark.html:
Funny! The dark Hanadori‚Äôs dark past as a rockstar was funny.

Sad for Seri that the girl did not show any more interest and then got the idea that him and Hanadori are trying to be a couple?

Seri has got a hell of a friend but that friend needs an off-switch üòÅ
